column2: This is a peer-review template for course COMP4008-PRG (programming in python).
For each cell marked as "-- *** --"script, please delete text there and write corresponded  information.
I will process this file using (python) script. So please write it carefully, I don't want to manually correct it
If your group has n people, your will need to review (n-1) people (excluding you). You will have (n-1)*10 marks in total that you need to split for you friend.
ignore some lower row(s) if you have less people in your group.
